viewData.name: Lenovo 13.3" ThinkPad L380 Laptop
viewData.short_description: Buy Lenovo 13.3" ThinkPad L380 Laptop featuring 1.6 GHz Intel Core i5-8250U Quad-Core, 8GB DDR4 | 256GB M.2 Opal2 SSD 13.3" 1366 x 768 Anti-Glare Display. Review Lenovo L380
viewData.long_description: The 13.3" ThinkPad L380 Notebook from Lenovo is designed for business purposes, featuring the performance, security, and portability users need. Specs-wise, it's powered by a 1.6 GHz Intel Core i5-8250U quad-core processor, 8GB of DDR4 RAM, and a 256GB M.2 Opal2 SSD. Should you need more room, you can attach external storage solutions using its USB ports, as well as quickly offload data to other devices with its microSD card reader.Its 13.3" display, driven by integrated Intel UHD graphics, features a 1366 x 768 resolution for crisp and clear HD playback. Moreover, it has an HDMI port that you can use for connecting a display for larger viewing and enhanced multitasking. Other integrated features include a fingerprint reader, 802.11ac Wi-Fi, Gigabit Ethernet LAN, Bluetooth 4.1, a webcam, a microphone, speakers, and an audio in/out jack. The operating system installed is Windows 10 Pro.
